title: Denizens Enraged (1R167)
text:
Set:	The Fellowship of the Ring
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Moria
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Skirmish: Make a [Moria] Orc strength +1 for each other [Moria] Orc you spot (limit +4).
Lore:	”…there came a great noise: a rolling Boom that seemed to come from depths far below, and to tremble in the stone at their feet.”
Rarity:	R
